data.name: Alchemistry
data.detailed_description:
Through challenges, use the given elements to craft transitional elements to reach given objective !
Challenges will gradually increase difficulties, starting with one or two steps crafts and finishing with dozen of intermediate elements !





Use sandbox mode to freely craft items together and maybe succeed to create rare items, and to discover everything !
Hundred of elements are available to craft, some are easy to guess, but the latest are not that easy ...



Would you be able to craft every item ? To resolve every challenge ?
Only one way to know: begin the new apprentice of Alchemistry !

Note: A Demo is available for free for you to try the game !

Developer Notes


I am a solo developer working on that game for few months in my free time. I really hope you will have fun and relax with this game :) Working on a small and relaxing puzzle/crafting game was a dream I got for a while. I hope that game will be a new step in the direction of a full time indie life. So thank you for any small step you participate in to help me creating this game.

This game will be updated as long I have nice ideas I can add without redoing the game from scratch, as I did with the previous game. And even your features ideas can be added if compatible !

We also have a discord community, if you want to join us, where you can share your opinions, questions, etc. about the game.

data.short_description: Practice Alchemistry, aka the art to merge elements to discover new ones ! Solve challenges or play freely to discover every elements. Craft the entire world from fire to life.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Russian*, Dutch*, Swedish*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7.5+
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
